titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Whereas aduertisement is giuen vnto vs, that there is at this time dispersed within our city of London, and the suburbs thereof, a great multitude of base and loose people ...
Proclamations. 1601-02-15
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: The year date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Ordering vagabonds to leave London on pains of death.
Line 1 of text ends "time"; last complete line of text ends "they"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
